imperative.translation[0].definitions[0]: extremely important and needing to be done or dealt with immediately

it is imperative (for somebody) to do something
imperative.translation[0].definitions[1]: an imperative verb is one that expresses an order, such as ‘stand up’
imperative.translation[1].definitions[0]: something that must be done urgently

imperative.translation[1].definitions[1]: an idea or belief that has a strong influence on people, making them behave in a particular way
Sharing food is the most important moral imperative in Semai society.
imperative.translation[1].definitions[2]: the form of a verb that expresses an order. For example, in the order ‘Come here’, ‘come’ is in the imperative.
